comment.author: 55198937@N05
comment._content: The brickworks have long gone, even most of Milner Street has gone - subsumed into Royal North Shore Hospital: Google Streetmap view today: [View Larger Map]

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: The hospital ?   I was thinking that the fire station at the corner of Lane Cove is in the background of this picture.   The was a brick factory on the north side of the hospital,  where the waste transfer station is,   but not next to the main road like this.   I think this is the brick pit where the Warmans factory was later.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: Part of Milner Street is still there,  it is now a culdesac near the park behind the Artarmon Public School.  Milner Street use to run up to the highway where alto ford is now.
